name: exodus
description: Painless relocation of Linux binaries–and all of their dependencies–without containers.
readme_summary: Exodus is a tool for painless relocation of Linux ELF binaries. It bundles all dependencies, creates a statically linked wrapper, and installs the package on the target machine, enabling software to run on systems where it might otherwise be unavailable due to missing packages or outdated distributions.
primary_use_case: Relocating Linux binaries and their dependencies to systems where they are not natively available or easily installed.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artisan meticulously crafting portable buildings, each representing a Linux binary, and carefully loading them onto a train departing from a chaotic construction site (representing a system with dependency issues). The train travels smoothly to a pristine, organized city (representing a system where the binary now runs flawlessly). Digital blueprints float around the artisan, subtly showing ELF structure. The train cars glow with a soft, internal light. The scene is set in a stylized workshop with warm, inviting lighting. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with clean lines and vibrant colors.

name: network-debug
description: Diagnose, benchmark, and optimize Linux networking. CLI tool with Wi-Fi, DNS, TCP, and system tuning.
readme_summary: The network-debug repository provides a CLI tool for diagnosing, benchmarking, and optimizing Linux networking. It offers features such as comprehensive network diagnosis, safety-first design with dry-run and rollback capabilities, and cross-distribution support. The tool is designed for developers, system administrators, and power users to optimize network performance with safety and flexibility.
primary_use_case: Diagnosing and optimizing Linux networking performance.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled mechanic under the hood of a sleek, futuristic car, fine-tuning glowing engine components with a digital wrench. The car represents a Linux system, and the mechanic is optimizing its network performance. Wires and cables are replaced with fiber optic strands, pulsing with light. A holographic display shows real-time network diagnostics and performance metrics. The scene is set in a high-tech garage with clean, minimalist design and soft, ambient lighting. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and sharp details.

name: fluentui-system-icons
description: Fluent System Icons are a collection of familiar, friendly and modern icons from Microsoft.
readme_summary: The Fluent UI System Icons repository offers a wide range of meticulously designed icons for diverse platforms. It provides installation guides and tools for seamless integration into Android, iOS, macOS, Flutter, and web projects. The repository also includes features like RTL/LTR support and a build pipeline for automated library creation.
key_features: Collection of familiar, friendly, and modern icons from Microsoft
Direction property for RTL and LTR support
Installation guides for Android, iOS, macOS, and Flutter
Importer tool for generating Android and iOS libraries
Build pipeline for automated library creation
Demo apps for Android and Flutter
primary_use_case: Providing a comprehensive set of system icons for use in various platforms and applications, including Android, iOS, macOS, Flutter, and web development.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artisan meticulously crafting icons on a digital loom, weaving together threads of inspiration and technology. Each icon emerges from the loom, glowing with clarity and purpose, ready to be deployed across various platforms. The artisan's workshop is filled with design tools and reference materials, subtly displaying the Fluent UI System Icons logo. Small screens show the icons in action on Android, iOS, Flutter, and web interfaces. The scene is bathed in soft, diffused light, creating a sense of precision and artistry. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and intricate details.

name: DocsGPT
description: DocsGPT is an open-source genAI tool that helps users get reliable answers from knowledge source, while avoiding hallucinations. It enables private and reliable information retrieval, with tooling and agentic system capability built in.
readme_summary: DocsGPT is an open-source genAI tool designed to provide reliable answers from various knowledge sources, mitigating hallucinations. It supports a wide range of document formats and web integrations, offering features like streamlined API keys, actionable tooling, and pre-built integrations. DocsGPT is designed for secure and scalable deployment, compatible with major LLMs and local models, making it suitable for enterprise-grade applications.
key_features: Wide Format Support for documents and images
Web & Data Integration from various online sources
Streamlined API Keys for easy integration
Actionable Tooling to connect to APIs and services
Pre-built Integrations like chat widgets and bots
Flexible Deployment with major LLMs and local models
primary_use_case: Providing reliable answers from knowledge sources while avoiding hallucinations using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG).
cover_image_prompt: A librarian, embodying a RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) system, stands amidst towering shelves of books, each representing a different knowledge source. The librarian wears a high-tech headset displaying snippets of information and swiftly retrieves the precise book needed by a user standing at a digital interface. The interface displays a clean chat UI with source citations. Digital particles flow from the books to the user's screen, ensuring accurate, hallucination-free answers. The scene is set in a modern, well-lit library with subtle UI elements integrated into the shelves. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and a vibrant color scheme.

name: sparrow
description: Structured data extraction and instruction calling with ML, LLM and Vision LLM
readme_summary: Sparrow is a tool for structured data extraction and instruction calling, leveraging ML, LLMs, and Vision LLMs. It supports various document formats and backends, offering a pluggable architecture and schema validation. The system provides RESTful APIs, visual monitoring, and is designed for universal document processing and enterprise readiness.
key_features: Multiple Backends (MLX, Ollama, vLLM, PyTorch, Hugging Face Cloud GPU)
primary_use_case: Structured data extraction and instruction calling from documents using ML, LLM, and Vision LLM.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled architect meticulously examining blueprints (documents) at a high-tech drafting table. The architect uses advanced tools (ML, LLM, Vision LLM) to extract precise data points from the blueprints, which then seamlessly transform into a beautifully structured 3D model (JSON output) displayed on a holographic screen. The drafting table is surrounded by glowing particles representing data, and subtle UI elements showcase the Sparrow logo and interface. The scene is set in a brightly lit, modern studio with a focus on clarity and precision. The image should be in a clean, 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and sharp details.

name: MaxKB
description: 🔥 MaxKB is an open-source platform for building enterprise-grade agents. MaxKB 是强大易用的企业级智能体平台。
readme_summary: MaxKB is an open-source platform designed for building enterprise-grade agents. It integrates a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline, supports agentic workflows, and offers MCP tool-use capabilities. MaxKB is suitable for applications like intelligent customer service, internal knowledge bases, and research, providing a comprehensive solution for creating intelligent agents.
key_features: RAG Pipeline for knowledge retrieval and reduced hallucinations
Agentic Workflow engine for complex AI process orchestration
Multi-modal input and output support (text, image, audio, video)
primary_use_case: Building enterprise-grade agents for intelligent customer service, corporate knowledge bases, academic research, and education.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled architect overseeing the construction of a grand library, where each book represents a piece of knowledge. The architect, symbolizing MaxKB, meticulously organizes and connects these books using glowing pathways, representing the RAG pipeline and agentic workflows. Some books are automatically delivered by drones (crawled online documents), while others are carefully placed by hand (uploaded documents). The library's blueprints subtly display code snippets and data flows. The scene is set in a bright, futuristic city, emphasizing seamless integration. The illustration should be in a clean, 3D isometric style with a vibrant color scheme, conveying intelligence and efficiency.
